title: IWCI Casters
body: I'd just like to point out how fantastic the casters have been for game 1 of the IWCI, having to keep discussion going for such a prolonged period of time and having to come up with different things to talk about. Twitch chat always gonna be distasteful toward it, but they've done a fantastic job talking for near on two whole hours for 13 minutes of gameplay. Sincerest praise to the casters; I hope they get paid extra either in monetary terms or genuine thankfulness from the Riot staff.

replies.body: So what happen to the stream?

They turned it off. 

The match will be remade. Tho I'm hoping the chiefs get the win, they were insanely ahead considering the small amount of time ..

if this game in mlg was anything to go by (they literally had game ending technical difficulties as the game froze on the winning flag capture), but im guessing that it wont matter and they will redo the game which sucks a lot..  for reference the team that should have won in the flag game lost the remake game

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dsRva2X4JyI
